message: Hi Bob, I'm looking to sell this product and I believe it would be a great fit for you. I'm asking for $15,000. What do you think?
Hi Alice, I'm interested in the product, but $15,000 is a bit out of my budget. I was thinking more along the lines of $10,000. Would you be willing to consider that?
Thanks for the offer, Bob. I understand your position, but $10,000 is quite a bit lower than I'm aiming for. Could you do $13,500?
Hi Alice, I appreciate your flexibility, but $13,500 is still a bit above my budget. I was thinking more along the lines of $11,000. Would you be willing to consider that?
